welcome: Welcome to the Non-profit (Free) Mini Game Collection! Enjoy!
random_completely_desc:
This is a game where you simply keep clicking until you hit the jackpot with a 1 in 1,000 chance.
If you're lucky, you might win on the very first try!
equation_game_desc:
Complete the equation in this game.
Tap the four symbols to switch them and make the equation valid.
The goal is to solve 10 problems as fast as you can.
about_para1:
This site is a non-profit (free) collection of mini games.
If you like it, we’d be happy if you shared it on X (formerly Twitter)!
this_app_use: This site is built using the following technologies.
